# pycfaliasEasy Cloudflare email alias management### Installation1. Install via python pip ``` pip install pycfalias ```2. Configure either via configuration file or environment variables ``` export CF_FORWARD_EMAIL=$your_forward_email export CF_TOKEN=$your_cloudflare_token export CF_ZONE_ID=$your_cloudflare_zone_id ``` OR Create a file in your home directory called ```.pycfalias.toml``` (note the dot) ``` "CF_FORWARD_EMAIL" = "$your_forward_email" "CF_TOKEN" = "$your_cloudflare_token" "CF_ZONE_ID" = "$your_cloudflare_zone_id" ```

(back to top)

## UsageList email aliases```pycfalias -l [--list]```Create an email alias```pycfalias -c [--create]```Remove existing email alias```pycfalias -r [--remove]```

(back to top)
